data.title: University of Memphis
data.meta_description: Simeon Blair (5) Defensive Back - Honors • 2024 NFF Hampshire Honor Society • 2023 Third-Team All-AAC • 2023 Fourth-Team All-AAC (Phil Steele) • Two-time SEC...
data.text:
Honors • 2024 NFF Hampshire Honor Society

• 2023 Third-Team All-AAC

• 2023 Fourth-Team All-AAC (Phil Steele)

• Two-time SEC Academic Honor Roll

2023 (Fifth Year) • Member of the Tigers who defeated Iowa State in the AutoZone Liberty Bowl

• One of nine players to start all 13 games on the season

• Totaled 63 tackles, 4.5 tackles for loss, two interceptions, five pass breakups, two quarterback hurries and one forced fumble

• His two fumble recoveries ranked 19th in the NCAA and second in the AAC

• Posted a season-best seven tackles and added a tackle for loss against Tulane and at Charlotte

• Had six tackles, one fumble recovery and one interception at UAB

• Totaled four stops and an interception against South Florida

• Recorded six tackles and a season-high two pass breakups against Boise State

• Posted six stops, 0.5 tackles for loss and one fumble recovery at Arkansas State

• Had one tackle for loss each against Bethune-Cookman, North Texas and Iowa State

• AAC Weekly Honor Roll (UAB)

• First-Team Preseason All-AAC (Phil Steele)

2019-22 (at Arkansas) • Played in 46 games for Arkansas from 2019-22, earning 22 starts

• Totaled 135 tackles, three tackles for loss, one sack and 11 passes defended

• Started all 13 games in 2022, registering 73 tackles, two tackles for loss and five passes defended

• Team captain

Prior to Memphis/Personal • Varsity letterwinner at Pine Bluff High School in Pine Bluff, Arkansas as a quarterback and defensive back

• Threw for over 1,641 yards and 20 touchdowns on 102 completions, averaging 182.3 yards per game, helping the Zebras to the second round of the 2016 Centennial Bank State Playoffs
